circumstances:
En route from Alicante to Barcelona and while approaching Tarragona, the airplane caught fire. The pilot reduced his altitude and attempted an emergency landing on a beach located in L’Hospitalet de l’Infant. The pilot escaped uninjured while the passenger died in the burned wreckage. Later, the pilot was injured while trying to save the passenger. 
Crew:
Lorenzo Lavinal, pilot. 
Passenger:
Mr. Dugrip-Quemel.
